scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary cradling the body of Christ after the crucifixion. Mary, wearing a blue mantle and a golden halo, gazes downwards with a sorrowful expression. Her hands support the lifeless body of Christ, who is depicted with a beard and long hair, his body pale and marked. The background is a rich, dark red, adorned with scattered golden stars and fleur-de-lis motifs, suggesting a celestial or symbolic setting.
